name: The Heist (itch) (ansem743)
description:
The Heist is a small game developed by "Rude Penguins".

Programmer: ErikTheBerik (aka Ansem743)

Art: Jette (aka thatjette)

The controls for keyboard are:

A and D to move.

B to breathe and lower your heart rate

Space for action (used in all minigames and for dialogues).

Controller is supported, action key is A (xbox), B for breate and left joy to move.
